extensions.name: github_function
extensions.description: Provides various GitHub-related functionalities such as searching repositories, cloning repositories, uploading projects to GitHub, creating repositories, and retrieving commits and issues.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to perform. Available actions: search_repos, clone_repo, upload_project, create_repo, get_commits, get_issues, get_owned_repos

parameters.name: arguments
parameters.description: Additional arguments required for the specified action.

search_repos.description: Search for repositories based on a query.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve. Default is 10.

parameters.name: repo_url
parameters.description: The URL of the GitHub repository to clone.

parameters.name: destination_folder
parameters.description: The path to the destination folder where the repository will be cloned.

upload_project.description: Upload files from a project directory to a GitHub repository.

parameters.name: project_dir
parameters.description: The path to the project directory containing files to upload.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository to upload to.

parameters.name: commit_message
parameters.description: The commit message for the upload.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository to create.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the GitHub repository. Default is an empty string.

get_commits.description: Get a list of commits for a GitHub repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The full name of the GitHub repository.

get_issues.description: Get a list of issues for a GitHub repository.

parameters.name: repo_name
parameters.description: The full name of the GitHub repository.

get_owned_repos.description: Get a list of repositories owned by a specific user or organization on GitHub.
